events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a rear-end collision on Main Street during rush hour.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the customer’s vehicle.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to manage the investigation and customer communication.
The customer was promptly acknowledged and informed that their claim is now in process.
Request sent to customer for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and mechanic’s damage assessment.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and contacted witness for additional information.
Investigation confirmed fault and established the extent of damage to the customer’s vehicle.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the customer to cover repairs and rental car expenses.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt response and clarity of the proposed settlement.
Claim was approved following customer’s acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for approved claim settlement was successfully issued to the customer’s bank account.
The claim was officially closed after confirming customer received payment and was satisfied.
The case files and all documentation related to the claim were archived for future reference.
